Class Lesson

java.lang.Object
team.logica_populi.dragonscore.base.Lesson
public class Lesson extends Object
A lesson represents a set of questions or question generators that fit a common theme. A lesson also contains a name, description, and internal id.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Lesson(String id)

  • Constructor Details

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String id)
      Create a lesson using only an internal id. The name and description will be empty strings.
      Parameters:
      id - The lesson's is

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String id, String name)
      Create a lesson using only an internal id and a name. The description will be an empty string.
      Parameters:
      id - The lesson's id
      name - The lesson's name

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String id, String name, String description)
      Create a lesson using only an internal id, a name, and a description. The description will be an empty string.
      Parameters:
      id - The lesson's id
      name - The lesson's name
      description - The lesson's description

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String id, List<BaseQuestion> staticQuestions, List<QuestionGenerator> questionGenerators)
      Create a lesson using an internal id and lists for static questions and question generators.
      Parameters:
      id - The lesson's id
      staticQuestions - The static questions assigned to this lesson
      questionGenerators - The question generators assigned to this lesson

    • Lesson

      staticQuestions - The static questions assigned to this lesson
      questionGenerators - The question generators assigned to this lesson

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String id, String name, String description, List<BaseQuestion> staticQuestions, List<QuestionGenerator> questionGenerators)
      Create a lesson using an internal id, name, description, and lists for static questions and question generators.
      Parameters:
      id - The lesson's id
      name - The lesson's name
      description - The lesson's description
      staticQuestions - The static questions assigned to this lesson
      questionGenerators - The question generators assigned to this lesson

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String id, String name, String description, List<BaseQuestion> staticQuestions, List<QuestionGenerator> questionGenerators, boolean randomize)
      Create a lesson using an internal id, name, description, and lists for static questions and question generators.
      Parameters:
      id - The lesson's id
      name - The lesson's name
      description - The lesson's description
      staticQuestions - The static questions assigned to this lesson
      questionGenerators - The question generators assigned to this lesson
      randomize - Randomize the order of answers for questions in this lesson

    • getNextQuestion

      public Question getNextQuestion()
      Create a new question from a generator or the static pool.

      It should be worth noting that with using both static questions and question generators in the same lesson users will notice static questions more often than generated ones.

      Returns:
      The new question
